\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said, Though thou wast \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thine \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, wast thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w thee|strong="H4886"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;
